answers.answer: You don't mention how well controlled his diabetes is on his medication plus diet. Could he be having low blood sugar? He should try testing when he has these symptoms. If not he needs to let his doctor know.

question: My best guy friends  has diabetes and im  not sure  if its his medication they have him on which I believe  it is called Metaformin but he is experience nausa. Also  he says he has de ja vu alot  and when he  has it he suddenly will get very sick  to his stomach and his  head  hurts then he  loses  track for a  minute where he is at. He  complains about a pain in  his  body his chest, stomach. Im  not sure if he is having an anxeity or maybe some little  seizure. He says he becomes very  light  headed   and he  can still have a  conversation but then sometimes its  like he  loses sight of whats going  on. Now  my concern is this the  medication  or is it something  else that may be causing him  to have  these attacks. Also so you know he is a 25 year old  male and he is 6'5. Thank you
title: De ja vu
